comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when you open a report during another report preview.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070403-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview a report in Web Viewer.(Do not closed the preview page)
2. Open another report.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException
